thread.title: BRIEF-Regal Hotels International Announces Lapse Of Aircraft Lease

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Regal Hotels International Announces Lapse Of Aircraft Lease

organizations.name: brief-regal hotels international announces lapse of aircraft lease feb

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Regal Hotels International Holdings Ltd :
* ANNOUNCES LAPSE OF AIRCRAFT LEASE * ‍UNABLE TO COME TO AGREEMENT ON CERTAIN DELIVERY CONDITIONS OF SUBJECT AIRCRAFT; TO CEASE TO PURSUE DELIVERY OF AIRCRAFT
* TRANSACTIONS CONTEMPLATED UNDER LEASING AGREEMENTS BETWEEN CENTURY CITY, PALIBURG AND REGAL​, WOULD NO LONGER PROCEED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
